sense.def:
To salute someone
pomeni pozdraviti nekoga ali mu pokazati spoštovanje na uraden način. Oficirji v vojski to naredijo tako, da se s prsti dotaknejo čela.

seg.quote: He stood as if he were saluting the flag.
He greeted King Edward VIII with the customary salute.

sense.def:
To salute a person or an achievement
pomeni javno pokazati ali izraziti svoje spoštovanje do osebe ali dosežka.

seg.quote: ...festivals in Spain that salute the independence of the Spanish character.
